ShortDescription.Value: Earn achievements naturally even with mods enabled. Keeps the backend on. Enjoy :)

Publish.LongDescription:
# Achievement Fixer Keeps the achievements active even when you have mods.
## How it works * Just install the mod, nothing else needed, it works automatically. * Stops the in-game warning ("Achievements are disabled because of mods"). * Re-enables achievements after any city loads or is switched.
## Notes * Some achievements shown on Steam are not available until DLCs are released (e.g., 6 from Bridges and Ports DLC). * Safe to remove at any time; does not touch saves. * This mod does not use Reflection or Harmony; safe/compatible, less likely to break with game updates. * Avoid using any other Achievement mods at the same time.
### Supports 9+ languages * English, Français (French), Deutsch (German), Español (Spanish), Italiano (Italian), 日本語 (Japanese) * 한국어 (Korean), Português (Brasil) (Brazilian Portuguese), 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese). * Future updates may add more languages. WIP: Tiếng Việt (Vietnamese)
### Advanced tab * If you don't like natural, go to the Advanced tab.
### Support * Feedback at Cities: Skylines Modding Discord: https://discord.gg/HTav7ARPs2 * Find the channel named `Achievement-Fixer`
### Credits * RiverMochi - mod author * inspired by Wayzeware's old Achievement Enabler (defunct) * StarQ for all the technical help. * rcav8tr for method to find game localization keys. * Necko1996 for testing * and the CS2 modding community for pointers and testing.
Publish.ChangeLog: **1.0.0** — Initial release. * Enables achievements with mods * UI language support: English, Français (French), Deutsch (German), Español (Spanish), Italiano (Italian), 日本語 (Japanese), 한국어 (Korean), Português (Brasil) (Brazilian Portuguese), 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese). * Hides the in-game 'achievements disabled' banner. * Adds Unlock/Clear/Reset tools.
